ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:0.5_0: 65. The training rule on married girls
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.2_0: the nuns were giving the full admission to married girls less than twelve years old.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.3_0: They were cold, heat, hunger, and thirst; the touch of flies, mosquitoes, wind, sun, and reptiles; rude and unwelcome criticism;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.4_0: and she’s unable to bear up with bodily feelings that are painful, severe, sharp, and destructive of life.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.5_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.6_0: “How can nuns give the full admission to married girls less than twelve years old?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.7_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.11_0: A married girl less than twelve years old is unable to endure cold and heat; hunger and thirst; contact with horseflies, mosquitoes, wind, the burning sun, and creeping animals and insects; rude and unwelcome speech;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.12_0: and she’s unable to bear up with bodily feelings that are painful, severe, sharp, and destructive of life.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.13_0: But a married girl who is twelve years old is able to endure these things.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.14_0: and she’s unable to bear up with bodily feelings that are painful, severe, sharp, and destructive of life.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.15_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.16_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:1.17.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to a married girl who is less than twelve years old, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.1.5_0: Who has less than twelve years of seniority:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.1.6_0: who has not reached twelve years of age.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.1.11_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.1.12_0: for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.1.13_0: and the last announcement is made by two announcements.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.1.14_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.1.15_0: while the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.2.1_0: If the girl is less than twelve years old, and she perceives her as less, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.2.2_0: If the girl is less than twelve years old, but she is unsure of it, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.2.3_0: If the girl is less than twelve years old, but she perceives her as more, and she gives her the full admission, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.2.4_0: If the girl is more than twelve years old, but she perceives her as less, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.2.5_0: If the girl is more than twelve years old, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.2.6_0: If the girl is more than twelve years old, and she perceives her as more, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.3.2_0: if she gives the full admission to a girl less than twelve years old, but she perceives her as more;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.3.3_0: if she gives the full admission to a girl more than twelve years old, and she perceives her as more;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.3.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.3.6_0: The fifth rule, the training rule on fifth, is finished.
